name: pet-voice-translator-monorepo
description: A monorepo for the Pet Voice Translator academic project.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client" "cd Pet_Voice_Translator-web-CAT-only && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py" "cd Pet_Voice_Translator-web-DOG-only && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
